name: Traffic Man
description:
You are the traffic lights, or a traffic lights manager, whatever that means XD.

The goal is to assure safe passage for a number of cars, with the minimum number accidents as possible.

Here are the game rules:

  • If you destroy more than 5 cars, you lose!
  • If you pass the target number of cars, you pass to the next level
  • Each button can block passage for 10 seconds, then it resets to allow passage of cars.

NOTE: The game is still in development, this is just a prototype, so normally it contains a lot of bugs right now,  all that I want is to get some feedback from you, all C&C are welcome :), it would be really appreciated!
